lines.text: Don't mind him, son. He's taken more dives than Esther Williams.
Seventeen fights in six months and not a mark on my beautiful kisser!
The blokes that don't go into the ring - they're the ones who get rich out of boxing.
It must've been terrific, winning the title an' that. How did it feel?
I don't know how it felt. It was a week before I could remember my own name...
